original: Throughout an individual's life, education should be perceived as a continual pursuit rather than a finite process. Learning is an inherent aspect of human life, allowing individuals to expand their knowledge through experiences, interactions, and exposure to diverse information. The dynamic nature of the world, marked by constant changes and advancements, necessitates ongoing learning to adapt and thrive in evolving environments. Technology is a prime example of this constant change, requiring individuals to continuously update their knowledge and skills to remain competitive. Education not only fosters personal growth and exploration of new interests but also enables individuals to stay current and competitive in the workforce. By embracing lifelong learning through various avenues such as self-directed learning, professional development, and educational courses, individuals can remain engaged, informed, and prepared to navigate the complexities of the modern world.
